text:
[Verse]
Walking lonely streets at night
Craving that sweet delight
Neon lights shining bright
Midnight snack feels so right

[Verse 2]
I see the ice cream truck ahead
Dreaming of flavors in my head
Chocolate vanilla twisty spread
Rain or shine I gotta be fed

[Chorus]
Ice cream in the midnight hour
Soft serve powers give me power
Frozen treat makes me feel alive
Cold and sweet my late night vibe

[Verse 3]
Every step I get closer still
Coins in my pocket not a bill
Hand to cone such a thrill
Summer heat I chase the chill

[Bridge]
Music plays a catchy tune
Underneath the silver moon
One more scoop oh so soon
Melting wishes gonna swoon

[Chorus]
Ice cream in the midnight hour
Soft serve powers give me power
Frozen treat makes me feel alive
Cold and sweet my late night vibe
title: Midnight Ice Cream
